result.eng: I was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.orig: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.html: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo ḋroim niṁneaċ ó ẛinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.

result.eng: I haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ga: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.orig: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.html: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair mé léi ó d'ḟág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.

result.html: Tá cúrsaí athraithe ó shinThings have changed since then.
result.ponchtml: Tá cúrsaí aṫraiṫe ó ẛinThings have changed since then.

result.eng: I've been very busy since I was named mayor.
result.ga: Tá mé an-ghnóthach ó ainmníodh i mo mhéara mé
result.orig: Tá mé an-ghnóthach ó ainmníodh i mo mhéara mé
result.html: Tá mé an-ghnóthach ó ainmníodh i mo mhéara méI've been very busy since I was named mayor.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé an-ġnóṫaċ ó ainmníoḋ i mo ṁéara méI've been very busy since I was named mayor.

result.eng: I've had a limp since then.
result.html: Tá mé bacach ó shinI've had a limp since then.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé bacaċ ó ẛinI've had a limp since then.

result.eng: I have been on my feet since morning.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo shuí ó mhaidin
result.orig: Tá mé i mo shuí ó mhaidin
result.html: Tá mé i mo shuí ó mhaidinI have been on my feet since morning.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ẛuí ó ṁaidinI have been on my feet since morning.

result.eng: This is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ga: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.orig: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.html: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo an ċéad uair go ḃfuil mise agus mo ċlann ar saoire le ċéile ó ẛinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.

result.eng: My daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ga: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.orig: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamar
result.html: Meabhrú laethúil ó shin dom ar na huafáis a chonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.
result.ponchtml: Meaḃrú laeṫúil ó ẛin dom ar na huafáis a ċonaiceamarMy daily reminder, since then, of the horrors we've seen.

result.eng: Black people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ga: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
result.orig: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
result.html: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón túsBlack people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ponchtml: Tá Gormaiġ i Meiriceá ón túsBlack people have been in America since the beginning.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
